Forms

Dozens of reusable input widgets to prompt and validate all sorts of data.

Textbox

Use havok/form/Textbox to collect simple text data.

Example

<input data-dojo-type="havok/form/TextBox" value="hello"/>

Placeholders

Add a placeholder

Filters

Note: The Trim filter is applied by default.

<input data-dojo-type="havok/form/TextBox"
       value="John Smith"
       data-dojo-props="
           label: 'name',
           filter: 'Uppercase'
       "
/>

Set a filter chain:

<input data-dojo-type="havok/form/TextBox"
       value="    John Smith    "
       data-dojo-props="
           label: 'name',
           filter: ['Trim', 'Uppercase']
       "
/>

Filters are created by havok/filter/factory which supports abreviated names for the filters bundled with havok. To set your own custom filter, pass the complete module name. Eg filters: 'My/Filter/Module'

Appendages

Simple text

<input data-dojo-type="havok/form/TextBox"
       data-dojo-props="
           label: 'name',
           prepend: 'pre',
           append: ['app1', 'app2']
       "
/>

Custom markup

pre1 append 1 append 2 
<div data-dojo-type="havok/form/TextBox"
     data-dojo-props="label: 'name'"
>
    <span><b>p</b>re1</span>
    <input />
    <span><b>a</b>ppend 1</span>
    <span><b>a</b>ppend 2</span>
</div>

Buttons

<div data-dojo-type="havok/form/TextBox"
       data-dojo-props="label: 'name'"
>
    <button>pre1</button>
    <input />
    <button>append 1</button>
    <button>append 2</button>
</div>

Dropdowns

Split dropdowns

  • Action
  • Another action
  • Something else here
  • Separated link
<div data-dojo-type="havok/form/TextBox"
       data-dojo-props="label: 'name'"
>
    <input />
    <div class="btn-group" data-dojo-type="havok/widget/DropdownToggle">
        <button data-dojo-attach-point="placementNode" class="btn">Action</button>
        <button data-dojo-attach-point="button" class="btn"><span class="caret"></span></button>
        <ul data-dojo-type="havok/widget/Dropdown">
            <li><a href="">Action</a></li>
            <li><a href="">Another action</a></li>
            <li><a href="">Something else here</a></li>
            <hr />
            <li><a href="">Separated link</a></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>

Programatically change appendages

Style the textbox

<input data-dojo-type="havok/form/TextBox"
       class="span2"
       data-dojo-props="label: 'name'"
/>
